name: Titan Tussle (Joel Mehonoshen)
description:
Titan Tussle is a 2v2 party style fighting game where the players try to force the opposite team out of the play arena using their specific abilities.

This game requires 4 people and 4 controllers to work.

Instructions:

1. Download the game.

2.Unzip the rar.

3.Plug in 4 controllers.

4.Find 3 friends.

5.Play!
